backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles with access control and storing public contact form submissions with admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a WhatsApp deep‑link update to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across pages, components, config, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx and providing the root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes and renders the app within the shared SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/forms/Internatio: A phone input component combining country dial code selection with a text input for full international numbers.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer layout showing branding, navigation links, services, and contact info using site configuration data.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile toggle menu using router state.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper that renders header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/marketing/CtaBlo: Marketing CTA section with title, description, and primary/secondary action links.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqAcc: Expandable FAQ accordion with toggleable questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IconBu: Lists business benefits with icons, titles, and descriptions in a styled grid.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PlanCa: Pricing plan card showing features, pricing details, and a CTA, with optional 'popular' styling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proble: Displays common business problems in a two-column grid with icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Service description card outlining what it is, why it matters, and business impact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Testimonials and a case study block showing business results and social proof.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThreeS: Three-step process section illustrating key stages with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ValueP: Grid of core value props with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Whatsa: Stylized WhatsApp button linking to a chat URL with customizable label.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Defines site-wide config including branding, contact info, WhatsApp numbers, and CTA labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor and track submission state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently imports useActor only.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes for teal glows and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, differentiators, and marketing components using siteConfig.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, backend submission, and WhatsApp message link generation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero section, pricing plans, benefits, and multiple marketing components.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders the pricing page with predefined plan data, ROI points, and layout sections using PlanCard components.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a list of service offerings with descriptions and benefits, rendered through ServiceCard components and a marketing layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappLink.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links and formats contact form data into a structured WhatsApp message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom themes, colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending requests related to improving WhatsApp contact form message formatting.
